action.action-desc: Mr. Ben Ray Luján of New Mexico (for himself and Ms. Michelle Lujan Grisham of New Mexico) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to make acequias eligible for assistance, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Acequia Conservation Program Eligibility Act.

subsection.text: Section 1201(a) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3801(a)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: The term acequia means an entity that—

subparagraph.text: is a political subdivision of a State;
is organized for the purpose of managing the operation of an irrigation ditch; and
does not have the authority to impose taxes or levies.

paragraph.text: Section 1201(a)(18)(B) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3801(a)(18)(B)) is amended by inserting acequia, after Indian tribe,.
Section 1238A(b)(2) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3838a(b)(2)) is amended by inserting land of an acequia, before and forested land.
Section 1238G(f) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3838g(f)) is amended by inserting or acequias after Indian tribes.
Section 1244(a) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3844(a)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the subsection header, by inserting and acequias after Indian tribes; and
by adding at the end of paragraph (2) the following:

paragraph.text: Subtitle H of title XII of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3865 et seq.) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in section 1265A(2)(A), by striking or an Indian tribe and inserting , or an Indian tribe or acequia,;

clause.text: in subsection (b)(1)(D), by inserting and acequias after Indian tribes;
in subsection (d)(2), by striking or Indian tribe and inserting Indian tribe, or acequia; and
in subsection (e), by striking or Indian tribe and inserting Indian tribe, or acequia; and

subparagraph.text: in section 1265D(a)(2), by adding , other than land of an acequia before the semicolon.

paragraph.text: Section 1271A(4)(E) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3871a(4)) is amended by inserting , including an acequia before the period at the end.
